name: emojis-search
description: command line interactive tool to explorer Unicode emojis

scripts.prettier: npx ts-refactor organizeImports "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*" --dontAsk && npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*" "spec/**/*.ts*"
scripts.browserify: rm -rf dist build && npm run build && mkdir -p dist/src/data/generated build && cp -r src/data/generated/* dist/src/data/generated   && npx browserify   -x blessed  -x term.js -x blessed-contrib -x editor-widget  -x text-buffer dist/src/main.js -o build/emoji-search-nodeps.js --ignore-missing -t brfs --no-debug && cp src/browser/* build && npx terser build/emoji-search-nodeps.js -o build/emoji-search-nodeps.js && mkdir -p ../../docs/browser && cp build/* ../../docs/browser
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run build

author: Sebastian Gurin
